sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { FaMobileAlt, FaLaptopCode } from "react-icons/fa"; const LearningGuide = () => { return (
{/* Section Title */}

How You Can Learn የመማር መንገድ

{/* Description */}

Learn at your own pace — whether you're using a phone or a computer. በስልክ ወይም በኮምፒዩተር በማንኛውም ጊዜ እና በራስዎ ፍጥነት ይማሩ።

{/* Cards */}
{/* Web Development */}

🌐 Web Development

{/* Mobile */}

English: Use online editors like CodePen or Replit to practice.
Amharic: የመስመር ላይ ኤዲተሮችን በመጠቀም ይማሩ።

{/* PC */}

English: Install VS Code and build small projects.
Amharic: VS Code በመጠቀም ትንሽ ፕሮጀክቶች ይፍጠሩ።

{/* Graphics Design */}

🎨 Graphics Design

{/* Mobile */}

English: Use Canva or Adobe Express.
Amharic: Canva ወይም Adobe Express በመጠቀም ይለማመዱ።

{/* PC */}

English: Explore Photoshop, Illustrator, or Figma.
Amharic: Photoshop፣ Illustrator ወይም Figma ይሞክሩ።

{/* Other Skills */}

📚 Other Skills

{/* Mobile */}

English: Search for free mobile tools related to your course.
Amharic: ተዛማጅ መሳሪያዎችን በሞባይል ይፈልጉ።

{/* PC */}

English: Find desktop tools & join online forums.
Amharic: የፒሲ መሳሪያዎችን ይጠቀሙ እና በመስመር ላይ በማህበረሰብ ይቀላቀሉ።

); }; export default LearningGuide;
